instructions.ar: انعطف يسارا لتبقى على Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.da: Drej til venstre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Turn left to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Cruza a laizquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Cruce a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fi: Käänny vasemmall(e/a) pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner à gauche pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה שמאלה כדי להישאר בCool highway (Ref1)
instructions.hu: Forduljon balra és maradjon a Cool highway (Ref1) szakaszon
instructions.it: Gira a sinistra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ja: 左に曲がり、Cool highway(Ref1)を進む
instructions.ko: 좌회전 회전하고 Cool highway (Ref1)로 직진해 주세요.
instructions.my: Cool highway( Ref1)​ပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ဘယ်ဘက်ကိုလှည့်ပါ
instructions.nl: Sla links om op Cool highway (Ref1) te blijven
instructions.no: Ta til venstre for å bli værende på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Vire à esquerda para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Vire à esquerda para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sol yöne dön
instructions.vi: Quẹo trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.yo: Tan-an apa osi lati duro si Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: 在Cool highway（Ref1）上继续向左行驶
